name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil on a thin crust. Perfect for a light meal.

name: Sushi Platter
description: Assorted sushi rolls with fresh fish, avocado, and rice, served with soy sauce and wasabi. Ideal for sushi lovers.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Juicy grilled salmon fillet with lemon herb seasoning, served with roasted vegetables. A healthy dinner option.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich chocolate layered cake with creamy frosting, perfect for dessert lovers or special occasions.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Fresh romaine lettuce with croutons, parmesan cheese, and creamy Caesar dressing. Great as a side or main dish.
